meanings.definition: Difficult to deal with or solve
meanings.sent1: Math problems can be the trickiest for me to solve.
meanings.sent2: The hardest puzzle was the trickiest one to figure out.
meanings.sent3: The maze was so tricky that even the smartest mouse got lost.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the dense forest was like tackling the trickiest challenge.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes sparkled with mischief as she faced the trickiest riddle.

meanings.sent1: The trickiest part of the magic show was when the magician made the rabbit disappear.
meanings.sent2: Detecting lies can be the trickiest task for some people.
meanings.sent3: The trickiest card trick left everyone in awe of the magician's skills.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the trickiest disguise for hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The spy's job was to uncover the trickiest secrets of the enemy.

meanings.sent1: The fox is known for being the trickiest animal in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The trickiest characters in the story turned out to be the villains.
meanings.sent3: His excuse for being late was the trickiest one he had ever come up with.
meanings.sent4: The trickiest move in chess is often the key to winning the game.
meanings.sent5: The trickiest smile hid a multitude of lies behind it.
